languages.text:
The order in which actions are taken in combat matters. Your character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action.
Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}, unable to move until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.
languages.original_text:
В бою порядок действий имеет значение. Ваш персонаж может передвигаться по полю только до тех пор, пока не совершит атакующее действие.
Атаковав противников, персонаж лишается оставшихся очков передвижения и не может двигаться до начала своего следующего хода. Исключение — если персонаж получил ОП после атаки (любым способом).

traits.locale_text:
Your order of actions in combat makes a difference. Your character can only move around the battlefield until they have taken an attack action.
Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining movement points and can no longer move until the start of their next turn. There is a way around this, however, if the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

Your order of actions in combat makes a difference. Your character can only move around the battlefield until they have taken an attack action.
Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining movement points and can no longer move until the start of their next turn. There is a way around this, however, if the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

The order you take actions in combat makes a difference. Your character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action.
Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining movement points, unable to move until the start of their next turn. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

The order you take actions in combat makes a difference. Your character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action.
Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining movement points, unable to move until the start of their next turn. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

The order in which actions are taken in combat matters. Your character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action.
Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}, unable to move until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

languages.text:
В бою порядок действий имеет значение. Ваш персонаж может передвигаться по полю только до тех пор, пока не совершит атакующее действие.
Атаковав противников, персонаж лишается оставшихся очков передвижения и не может двигаться до начала своего следующего хода. Исключение — если персонаж получил ОП после атаки (любым способом).

El orden en el que se ejecutan las acciones en combate es importante. Tu personaje solo puede moverse por el campo de batalla antes de lanzar una acción de ataque.
Cuando un personaje ataca, pierde sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} restantes y no puede moverse hasta el principio de su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Hay una forma de resolver esto si, por ejemplo, el personaje tiene alguna forma de obtener puntos de movimiento después de atacar.
languages.original_text:
The order in which actions are taken in combat matters. Your character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action.
Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}, unable to move until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

traits.locale_text:
El orden en el que ejecutas tus acciones en combate marca la diferencia. Tu personaje solo puede moverse por el campo de batalla antes de lanzar una acción de ataque.
Cuando un personaje ataca, pierde sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} restantes y no puede moverse hasta el principio de su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Hay una forma de resolver esto si, por ejemplo, el personaje tiene alguna forma de obtener {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}puntos de movimiento{/g} después de atacar.

languages.text:
戦闘中に起こすアクションの順番は重要である。キャラクターは攻撃アクションを実行する前だけ戦場を移動できる。.
一度攻撃したキャラクターは、残りの{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を失い、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始まで移動できなくなる。ただし、キャラクターが攻撃後に移動ポイントを獲得する何らかの方法を持っている場合などは、これを回避することができる。
languages.original_text:
The order in which actions are taken in combat matters. Your character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action.
Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}, unable to move until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘中起こすアクションの順番によって違いが生じる。キャラクターは攻撃アクションを実行する前だけ戦場を移動できる。
一度攻撃したキャラクターは、残りの{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を失い、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始まで移動できなくなる。ただし、キャラクターが攻撃後に{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}移動ポイント{/g}を獲得する何らかの方法を持っている場合などは、これを回避することができる。

languages.text:
战斗中不同的行动顺序，会带来截然不同的结果。您的角色只能先移动，再攻击。
角色进行攻击之后，会失去所有剩余{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始前都无法移动。不过，部分时候在角色攻击之后依然可以移动。例如，部分能力在攻击之后可以让角色获得额外移动点数。
languages.original_text:
The order in which actions are taken in combat matters. Your character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action.
Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}, unable to move until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

traits.locale_text:
战斗中不同的行动顺序，会带来截然不同的结果。您的角色只能先移动，再攻击。
角色进行攻击之后，会失去所有剩余{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始前都无法移动。不过，部分时候在角色攻击之后依然可以移动。例如，部分能力在攻击之后可以让角色获得额外移动点数。

languages.text:
Die Reihenfolge, in der Aktionen im Kampf ausgeführt werden, ist wichtig. Dein Charakter kann sich auf dem Schlachtfeld nur bewegen, bis er eine Angriffsaktion ausführt.
Sobald ein Charakter angreift, verliert er seine restlichen {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} und kann sich bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} nicht mehr bewegen. Es gibt allerdings eine Möglichkeit, dies zu umgehen, wenn ein Charakter beispielsweise in der Lage ist, nach einem Angriff Bewegungspunkte zu erhalten.
languages.original_text:
The order in which actions are taken in combat matters. Your character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action.
Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}, unable to move until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

traits.locale_text:
Die Reihenfolge, in der du deine Aktionen im Kampf ausführst, macht einen Unterschied. Dein Charakter kann sich nur auf dem Schlachtfeld bewegen, bevor er eine Angriffsaktion ausführt.
Sobald ein Charakter angreift, verliert er seine restlichen {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} und kann sich bis zum Beginn seiner nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} nicht mehr bewegen. Es gibt jedoch eine Möglichkeit, dies zu umgehen, wenn der Charakter zum Beispiel in der Lage ist, nach einem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}Bewegungspunkte{/g} zu erhalten.

languages.text:
Au combat, l'ordre dans lequel sont effectuées les actions n'est pas anodin. Votre personnage peut uniquement se déplacer sur le champ de bataille avant une action d'attaque.
Une fois qu'un personnage attaque, il perd ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} restants et ne peut plus se déplacer jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Il est cependant possible de contourner ce problème si, par exemple, le personnage dispose d'un moyen de gagner des points de déplacement après avoir attaqué.
languages.original_text:
The order in which actions are taken in combat matters. Your character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action.
Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}, unable to move until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

traits.locale_text:
Au combat, l'ordre dans lequel vous effectuez vos actions n’est pas anodin. Votre personnage peut uniquement se déplacer sur le champ de bataille avant une action d'attaque.
Une fois qu'un personnage , il perd ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} restants et ne peut plus se déplacer jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Il est cependant possible de contourner ce problème si, par exemple, le personnage dispose d'un moyen de gagner des {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}points de déplacement{/g} après avoir attaqué.

languages.text:
Çatışmada eylemlerin gerçekleştirilme sırası önemlidir. Karakterin, çatışma alanında yalnızca herhangi bir saldırı eylemi yapmadan önce hareket edebilir.
Bir karakter saldırdığında, kalan {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanlarını{/g} kaybeder ve bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başlayana kadar hareket edemez. Bununla beraber, karakterin saldırdıktan sonra hareket puanı kazanabileceği bir yol varsa bu sınırlamayı aşmak mümkündür.
languages.original_text:

Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}, unable to move until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.
